name: ai-eng-system-workspace
description: Compounding engineering system for Claude Code and OpenCode. Shared agents, commands, skills, and plugin development tools.

scripts.build: bun run build:core && bun run build:cli && bun run copy:content
scripts.build:core: cd packages/core && bun run build && cd ../.. && cp -r packages/core/opencode packages/core/dist/.opencode
scripts.copy:content: cp packages/core/dist/index.js dist/ && cp packages/core/dist/*.d.ts dist/
scripts.build:watch: bun run build && cd packages/cli && bun run build:cli --watch
scripts.validate: bun run build && cd packages/cli && bun run validate
scripts.quality: bun run lint && bun run build
scripts.dev: bun install && bun run build:core && bun run build:cli
scripts.publish: bun run publish:core && bun run publish:cli
scripts.publish:all: bun run publish:core && bun run publish:cli
